1110000011010110 1101011100101001 0 -> sum: 1011011111111111, cout: 1

0111010001101101 1100100111010011 0 -> sum: 0011111001000000, cout: 1

0000000000000000 1111111111111111 0 -> sum: 1111111111111111, cout: 0
